creator: jc@thp.org
text:
mod_ldap, which contains serious bug fixes over 2.0.49, was not included in the
2.0.50 binary release. This renders mod_auth_ldap unworkable

creator: minfrin@apache.org
text: Is the module still missing in v2.0.52?

in 2.0.54 it has been renamed util_ldap.so, this is what you need in your 
httpd.conf:

LoadModule ldap_module modules/util_ldap.so
LoadModule auth_ldap_module modules/mod_auth_ldap.so


When I shutdown apache I get a crash in util_ldap.so but it is still in 
experinmental tho.
creator: eddiearmeen@yahoo.co.uk
chip@force-elite.com
text: mod_ldap is included in recent win32 binaries.
